title: Large Trolley Duffle Bag
subtitle: This wheelie duffle bag is a getaway must-have!
description: From overnight getaways to city breaks, some things call for a compact alternative to a suitcase, which is where this trolley duffle bag comes in! It has been divided into a main section and side pocket to provide ample room for all your essentials and to make keeping everything organised that little bit easier. As well as boasting two straps, it has a carry handle and retractable handle on the side giving you the choice of carrying it or pulling it behind you. Its soft exterior makes this duffle bag easy to store and a great option for road trips where space is limited. For greater peace of mind, the zips have holes so that they can be secured with padlocks. What more could you want!Material Composition: Polyester 100%We are happy to refund or exchange any item within 28 days of purchase, provided the item is returned in a saleable condition with an original receipt. View full details of our Returns Policy.

title: PU Coated Backpack
subtitle: A backpack suitable for hikes, treks and beyond!
description:
Take to the great outdoors in style with this cool coated backpack that’s as practical as it is pleasant to look at. Featuring a PU coating, it boasts a main zip-up compartment and zip pouch towards the front, as well as a secure buckle fastening, two side pockets (perfect for holding bottles/umbrellas/phones and more), plus a useful handle attached to the back for easy hanging when it’s not in use. Pick your colour and get ready to tackle all sorts of outdoor activities.Material Composition: Polyurethane Coated Textile (Visible) 100%

title: Keith Haring Canvas Shopper Bag
subtitle: Why keep your Keith Haring confined to the wall?
description:
Synonymous with street art, particularly in New York, Keith Haring created characters that are still instantly recognisable decades after he scrawled them on walls and subway stations throughout the city. In order to add some artistic flair to your food shop, we’ve stamped one of the artist’s most famous prints onto the front of this canvas shopper! Whether you need a strong bag for your shopping or just fancy a stylish bag to carry all your bits and pieces, this Keith Haring shopper is all you need!Collection: Keith Haring
Art
Keith Haring

title: Kem Buckle-up Backpack
subtitle: This kem backpack is you new work essential
description:
This season's Kem range is all about taking those daily essentials and adding a touch of timeless style, and what’s more essential than a backpack? Perfect for carrying everything necessary to those all-important work meetings or conferences, it gives off a professional and clean look. The leather effect exterior is finished with a gloss crocodile skin texture that just exudes sophistication. The top flap is closed with a buckle, and there is a spacious interior that holds everything you need. A hook loop lets you hang this bag up, so it is out of your way when not needed, and the adjustable backstraps will make transporting it easy. So, what are you waiting for? Add this bag to your look now.Kem
Kem

description:
Celebrate the ‘90s with this canvas bag. Not only a great year for fashion, it also gave us great music so celebrate one of the rap legends with this 2Pac design. The bag showcases various images of the iconic rapper, as well as the title of one of his albums, in monochrome for a trendy finish. Perfect for your weekly shop, this bag is reusable and has two sturdy handles so you’ll no longer have to worry about whether that plastic bag is going to make it home! description:

The material is designed to be hard-wearing and robust, able to carry around your essentials as you travel between home, work, the gym, or just running errands.
